name: Bitamin Quest 2ND ATTRACT
description:
An elf woman who can be called a slut
It's an RPG where you can get rid of various things here and there.
The Akumas from the "Human Bitamin" series, who were the bosses in the previous work,
In this work, we will become friends and adventure together.

It's not much different from the previous work in terms of what it does.
It's like that I'm happy to have a baby.
